entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
